CS5 DEVELOPMENTS IN MASTER COLLECTION:
-----------------------------------------

Adobe Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Creative Suite Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 5 Master Collection provides a rich set of creative tools for designing in different media. Investigate the exciting improvements among which include new ways to create interactive, innovative performance and integration with the new Adobe Online Services Live ** CS that will increase your productivity. CS Live services are free for a limited time.


Design without limits
Discover great new design tools and innovative ways to expand their creative abilities using a full range, the ultimate development environment for virtually any medium.

And use the new bristle brush to draw with the expressive quality of watercolors, oils and pastels, but with the extensibility of the vectors.

Create documents and memorable presentations with interactivity, animation, sound and video into Adobe InDesign Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® CS5. Work up to ten times faster with large images in Adobe Photoshop Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Extended CS5 and more smoothly into high definition CS5 Adobe After Effects Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and Adobe Premiere Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Pro CS5 thanks to native 64-bit. Create sophisticated typography for the Web with bidirectional text support vertical text layout with the capacity to flow, and supports more than 30 writing systems including Arabic, Chinese, Hebrew, and many more in Adobe Flash Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Professional CS5 .

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
----------------------------
Multicore Intel processor with 64-bit support
Mac OS X v10.5.7 or v10.6.3, Mac OS X requires v10.6.3 for GPU accelerated performance in Adobe Premiere Pro
2 GB of RAM (4 GB or higher recommended)
26.3 GB available hard disk space for installation, additional free space required during installation (can not install on a volume that uses a file system with case-sensitive, or removable storage devices flash-based)
Resolution of 1,280 x 900 (recommended of 1,280 x 1,024) OpenGL graphics card with hardware accelerated qualified, 16-bit color and 256 MB VRAM
Adobe certified card GPU to GPU accelerated performance in Adobe Premiere Pro Visit the system requirements for Adobe Premiere Pro to get the updated list of compatible cards
Some GPU-accelerated features of Adobe Photoshop require graphics support for Shader Model 3.0 and OpenGL 2.0
7,200 RPM hard drive intended for editing compressed video formats and RAID 0 for uncompressed
Sound card compatible with Core Audio
DVD-ROM drive supports dual-layer DVD drive (SuperDrive for burning DVDs, Blu-ray external burner to create multimedia discs Blu-ray)
Java Runtime Environment 1.5 or 1.6
QuickTime 7.6.2 software required for QuickTime and multimedia features
It requires the Adobe Flash Player 10 software to export SWF files and play back DVD projects exported as SWF files
Internet connection required for broadband online services **
